pub async fn delete_user_policy(
    client: &iamClient,
    user: &User,
    policy_name: &str,
) -> Result<(), SdkError<DeleteUserPolicyError>> {
    client
        .delete_user_policy()
        .user_name(user.user_name.as_ref().unwrap())
        .policy_name(policy_name)
        .send()
        .await?;

    Ok(())
}
